Text.Page:
Warriors of Kaiator! You must never forget!
Our hero, Kaidun, was an aman without horns.

You should remember, that hornless amans were despised for such a long time!

However! Kaidun proved them wrong with his dauntless courage.

Despite his physical flaw, he was the most worthy candidate for the next commander.

However! What happened to him?
While patrolling Southern Shara, he was ambushed by Thulsa.

Who could have done such a thing?Next page.

I swear to Kaia that someone is behind this.

Someone with a dark ambition to become the next commander.

Fellow amans, you must know the truth.
This conspiracy must be unmasked!

They say that in the end, justice will be victorious.
You must be aware of...

(Huge letters were printed but it's torn off.)Stop reading
